Ninjutsu {R}{W}
[i]Retainer[/i] – Noble spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Hoshidan Infiltrator[/i] – Each creature card in your hand has ninjutsu {1}{R}{W}.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Kagero, Traditional Ninja deals combat damage to a player, you may reveal any number of creature cards from your hand. Shuffle each card revealed this way into your library, then draw that many cards.
